The constructor will initializes the property of the new instance using and .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool CanSelectArbitrarily ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CanSelectArbitrarily() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns true if this movement method allows arbitrary selection of any text; false if it has no selection (like a movement method that only scrolls) or a constrained selection (for example limited to links.

remarks.para: Returns true if this movement method allows arbitrary selection of any text; false if it has no selection (like a movement method that only scrolls) or a constrained selection (for example limited to links. The "Select All" menu item is disabled if arbitrary selection is not allowed.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual int GetMovementMetaState (Android.Text.ISpannable buffer, Android.Views.KeyEvent e);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 GetMovementMetaState(class Android.Text.ISpannable buffer, class Android.Views.KeyEvent e) cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the meta state used for movement using the modifiers tracked by the text buffer as well as those present in the key event.

remarks.para:
Gets the meta state used for movement using the modifiers tracked by the text buffer as well as those present in the key event.
The movement meta state excludes the state of locked modifiers or the SHIFT key since they are not used by movement actions (but they may be used for selection).

remarks.para: Performs a movement key action. The default implementation decodes the key down and invokes movement actions such as and . calls this method once to handle an . calls this method repeatedly to handle each repetition of an .

remarks.para: This property is used to control which jclass is provided to methods like .

MemberSignature.Value: protected override Type ThresholdType { get; }
.property instance class System.Type ThresholdType

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control virtual vs. non virtual method dispatch against the underlying JNI object. When this property is equal to the declaring type, then virtual method invocation against the JNI object is performed; otherwise, we assume that the method was overridden by a derived type, and perform non-virtual methdo invocation.
